name: Super Honmei: GI Seiha
overview: Super Honmei: GI Seiha ("Super Favorite: GI Domination", where GI comprises the highest level of horse racing in Japan) is a horse-raising and racing game for the Super Famicom. The player must build a stable of racehorses and earn money by entering them in races. Unlike its contemporaries Derby Stallion and Thoroughbred Breeder, Super Honmei was never followed up by a sequel. It did, however, receive a Game Boy equivalent in Honmei Boy.
